website_summaries.verdict: Dive bag with durable mesh fabric that can carry all of the gear you need and that comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Features a lightweight mesh material that allows wet items to air dry
Has a separate pocket that's water-resistant to keep certain items dry
Duffel bag design, yet it has two backpack-style straps to make it comfortable to carry for long periods
cons: Tight mesh won't allow fast air drying

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is a mesh bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best mesh bag I have purchased thus far!!! Yes it actually is a mesh bag. The sides are constructed with multiple layers of mesh that are layered so as to keep the contents of the bag concealed!!! It doesn’t seem to interfere with air flow or prevent any drying. The exterior upper pocket is large enough to store all those extras that you might not want to get wet. Seem to actually be water proof!!! I was able to store my post dive hoodie in it during a rain shower and had a perfectly dry hoodie to put on after my dive. Great construction, super convenient, and at a really great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dive boat duffel bag
customer_reviews.text: As my diving equipment continues to accumulate (you know what I mean), I was looking for a sturdy boat duffel for my gear. Dive gear is very expensive, so we all want to transport it safely from the car to boat. I am extremely happy with this bag. I have used it on several dives now and holds my entire kit. You can either carry like a duffel bag, or backpack. Very nice waterproof end pocket that holds more than it looks like it would, and the zipper is heavy duty. I would purchase again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Duensing

customer_reviews.title: Failed after first few uses!
customer_reviews.text: Bag worked ok for the first month or so before failing. I only have 20 dives TOTAL under my belt and have used this bag for about half of those dives! The zipper has completely separated from the bag and the stitching tore right open. Of course this happens outside of my return period too. I would like a refund for a bag that couldn't hold up to some light use! :(
customer_reviews.author: eric schott

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: Was a good bag until the zipper broke. Not made well in my opinion. Design is good though and I like the dry pocket. I only used it on 5 trips (only on boat) when the zipper came apart at the base. EDIT: Contacted the company about the zipper and they are sending me a replacement bag. They state that they stand by their product. A1 in my book.
customer_reviews.author: debra-do

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Fails Quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This bags size and ability to be carried as a backpack is handy. However, after only a few dives, the zipper FELL OFF. Bag was not overloaded, still it just fell off in my hand after the zipper hardware came loose due to poor construction.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Depew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dive bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dive bag! Love the extra pockets on the end and hidden inside, lots of room and easily holds all my dive equipment (BC, regulator, 2 mask/snorkel sets, fins, gloves, boots and miscellaneous accessories). I love how it turns into a back pack for comfortable carrying if walking any distance (airport travel or walk to the dive boat) and easily coverts to a hand carry bag! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Imlaynlow

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it does what you expect it to.
customer_reviews.text: It's a large bag that fits all my gear, the main pouch seems sturdy enough for getting gear from the house to the car to the dive; just don't drag it across to the floor. The dry side the zipper falls apart if it gets overloaded, it got overloaded when I put my regulator in there. What can I put in there?
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was second attempt at a bag for my diving gear. My first was one of those packs that load from the top and have backpack straps. I worked, but I did't like putting my gear in it. I like this duffel bag style much better. Getting gear into it is much easier and it still had the ability to be worn as a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: RossYoung

customer_reviews.title: I turned to mesh...😁
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition!...the mesh is great, non see-through to keep it discreet like dirty garments!! Excellent for water activities and dirty laundry days...also contains a pocket to protect valuables and .....theres a small mesh pocket inside the bag, I found this by mistake
customer_reviews.author: James Battle

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag before a week long dive trip to Bonaire...it was large enough for all my gear and then some, the way you can wear it like a backpack made it super easy to carry along with other luggage going thru the airport. It looked sharp as well...no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: A large and useful bag
customer_reviews.text: Size of this bag is simply amazing, I carried my fins as well as my wife's fins, five masks inside of their cases and four snorkel tubes in addition to various other accessories. There was still room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: We are avid divers and have been looking for a bag like this for a long time. Finally! Great bag. Extremely well made and the cost is great! Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hoelzer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on 8/24 on amazon for a cruise we took 9/23 - 9/30. I bought the bag to take snorkel gear, etc. to take a shore. On my first use of the bag the zipper for the end cap section came apart. The other zipper for the bag was a bit difficult to open and close. Nice bag but poor zippers.
customer_reviews.author: James Michael Busby

customer_reviews.title: Solid dive bag
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive on this purchase as I used this mesh bag as my main travel bag for my dive gear to Roatan. The bag survived the return trip with connecting flights with no problems, four flights in all. Very happy with the purchase, very well made and solid all around product.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach/Snorkel bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase we made for our trip to Maui! It made lugging our gear so much easier and much more comfortably. The shoulder straps are amazing! The mesh allows for sand and water to escape and makes it super easy to clean. It would be great for anything you need to haul to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This bag dries out quickly and is quite durable. The handles on this bag make it easy to carry in hand or as a backpack. If you have alot of coldwater gear, then it might be a tight squeeze fitting it all in there, but otherwise it has great capacity.
customer_reviews.author: steven w.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boat bag
customer_reviews.text: Loaded all gear from travel bag into this perfect boat bag. Best part is that it has a dry compartment for phone and wallet. Very long, will accommodate XL fins. Very light weight. Back pack straps are not meant for long hikes, but functional
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: So far this bag has been perfect. Used it for 2 snorkeling trips for 4 of us with plenty of room. Stored all masks, snorkels, fins, towels and more. Highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Crystle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag.. fits everything for a complete scuba load out. It’s confortable when carrying. My only con is the zipper could be of heavier weight... it does fine, but I think over time it will be the first thing to fail...
customer_reviews.author: james carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: great bag and even better price. Its thick and sturdy, held 4 sets of snorkel gear and I like that it carries like a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Overall Solid Quality
customer_reviews.text: The bag is bigger than I would have liked, but purchased it due to the reviews on quality. I agree with those reviews - this is well made and the zippers are solid. I wish there were more dry pockets in the bag. Otherwise, it is a quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HillTopView

customer_reviews.title: Sent back- Bag zipper would not stay zipped
customer_reviews.text: Bag is large. But the side pocket zipper would never stay zipped. It kept coming apart at the zipper. Finally had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: N. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for a week in Cozumel. Overall just great. Fits all my equipment easily but is not too big. Very well made and durable. Back pack straps make it easy to carry. All week I've gotten compliments from other divers.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for 2 upcoming vacations and have used it on the first one. It’s a nice big bag that was able to hold all of my gear as well as an additional dry bag I purchased for my towel, shirt and phone. It worked great as a backpack when I carried it around St. MAARTEN. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schalk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly, and is large enough to fix diving fins, and 7mm wet suit, mask, etc. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Strehle

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zipper
customer_reviews.text: After much research, the Meister MMA bag seemed like the best option. I loved that there is mesh to easily dry dive gear, a dry pouch, and that it doubled as a duffle or back pack. Unfortunately, after getting to use it only for a short while, the zipper on the main compartment came right off. The stitching where the zipper connects to the main bag had come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect for 2 sets of fins and backpack straps made it easy for transporting snorkeling gear to the beach. Well made and sturdy. Would recommend and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Renee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fit my Halcyon Eclipse backplate, full wetsuit (3/2), fins, mask with no issues. Not to mention, I used packing material to help protect my gear during a recent round trip flight. Highly recommend, especially at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: chris c.

customer_reviews.title: The right size
customer_reviews.text: My full foot 29.5" fins fit in the bag perfectly, along with the rest of my gear. The water proof round pocket at the top is a great design, there is a tag on it that states to not rely on it being completely waterproof but I think it will meet my needs. The material the bag is made of is comparable to what a mesh motorcycle jacket is made with.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Really roomy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really roomy; lightweight and easy to carry either like a backpack or as a large duffel (the extra zippered compartment at one end is perfect for all your pocket stuff). I have not used it yet so I cannot be sure how well it holds up but it looks so far like value for the money..
customer_reviews.author: Avery H.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a dive trip to the Caribbean this past Spring. I had some issues with the bags zipper not stay closed but the bag performed well and fit all my dive gear to include BCD. After I returned, I contacted Meister regarding the zipper. The customer service was outstanding and they shipped me a new bag immediately. They definitely stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a good price point
customer_reviews.text: Great bag that I use for snorkel gear, it carries two sets of snorkel gear with full size fins with room to spare side pocket is a dry pouch which has plenty of room to carry valuables and I love that it doubles as a backpack and folds down small for storage
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Shaw

customer_reviews.title: One big bag for the both of us.
customer_reviews.text: Our fins, masks and other little things we needed were outgrowing their bags. We decided to get one big bag and share. It's perfect! We even have a little extra room, which is nice! Can't wait for a trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: well constructed with easy access to contents
customer_reviews.text: well constructed with easy access to contents, Dry section works well to hold dive logs and wallet contents while on dive boat.
customer_reviews.author: Fostersbeach

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag but, after using it just 2 dive trips the zipper broke and won't stay closed now. I didn't have that much weight in it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: stephen callaway

customer_reviews.title: I would give it a zero if I could
customer_reviews.text: Used this 3 three times and now it has 5 holes in the mesh. Never put weights in it or over packed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag for dive gear!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag at a good price! Perfect fit for all dive gear as well as a compartment for personal items as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great for dive gear
customer_reviews.text: Great size, feels/looks like good quality, haven’t used for my dive gear yet but confident it will all fit great for an upcoming vacation. Comparable to other dive bags I’ve seen for $15+ more, but comes with the dry pocket. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shoulder straps make it easy to carry like a backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely massive, shoulder straps make it easy to carry like a backpack. Great All around super large pack for everything.
customer_reviews.author: John Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bag works great and holds all my gear
customer_reviews.text: Bag works great and holds all my gear. I especially like the dry part as there are sensitive items that need to stay dry and scuba is never dry even on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Johuam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself has potential unfortunately only used it twice and the zipper does not close correctly. would not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. Looks nice and I was able to squeeze 2 full sets of dive gear in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McNeese

customer_reviews.title: BAD ZIPPERS
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through 4 of these bags. about 5-10 day trips is all you will get out of them. Zippers fail immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Erector

customer_reviews.title: Best scuba gear bag available
customer_reviews.text: Love this scuba gear bag! Plenty of room and the dual use straps are great, I would throw it on like a backpack for long walks, much easier to carry that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge! You can easily fit all your gear inside. Was very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This worked very well for my live aboard dive trip ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for my live aboard dive trip. All my gear fit inside and it all stowed under the seat on the boat. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy  this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Premium quality. High quality materials and stitching. Perfect amount of room for all my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Mele Tong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome space and look. Love the shoulder straps...makes it a lot easier to carry equipment
customer_reviews.author: Mark Flournoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprised with the quality of the fabric and how comfortable it is to carry with straps.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirezsaad

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious
customer_reviews.text: It is very spacious. All my diving equipment fit. It’s great to carry on your back. Colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Prlanie

customer_reviews.title: Why have a metal zipper on a dive bag?!
customer_reviews.text: If this bag had a heavy duty plastic zipper, it would be perfect. Instead, it has a metal zipper that very quickly corroded and broke. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Popik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile bag, love that you can carry as a backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for salt water excurrsions
customer_reviews.text: The shape and size is great for scuba gear. I didn't realize the zipper is metal (aluminum I believe) or I would not have purchased it. On the first trip we took it on to Cancun the zipper was corroded and stuck before we got back home even after rinsing the bag with fresh water with the rest of the gear.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Water proof pouch great for sweaty gear after class
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for BJJ/MMA. I'm 6'4" and fits all my gear such as shin pads, Muay Thai pads, boxing gloves, gi and rash guards. Water proof pouch great for sweaty gear after class.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Backpack mode: have to use Velcro to make the straps snug. Pretty clumsy to use
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like It’s big, durable, and let’s air in so nothing gets moldy
customer_reviews.author: jim oshea

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again. Very well made. Large enough to hold all my gear including fins, BCD, 7mm full suit and jacket. Recommend to all my dive friend!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: great bag for all kinds of gear. Well built to and a great price
customer_reviews.author: P. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product all around! Fits everything with room to spare and the backpack is much nicer for carrying around!
customer_reviews.author: Mattastic

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This bag stood up to a season of diving this year, definitely was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: william martin

customer_reviews.title: Right size for diving gear.
customer_reviews.text: Large, easily fits all gear. The waterproof is nice to keep a few things dry.
customer_reviews.author: daniel h johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my scuba gear. Great bag, perfect size and well built
customer_reviews.author: E.Azbell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: Love the padded shoulders and the mesh material is strong..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag, I love it, it has a small semi-dry bag on one of the sides, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: ivivas

customer_reviews.title: great bag, lots of room
customer_reviews.text: We were able to carry fins, masks and snorkels for 5 adults. I'm sure we could have fit another set. The shoulder straps made it easy to carry the bag on a sketchy hike down to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: John Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best dive bag I have ever had! Dry pocket not 100% water proof, but it protects from most splashes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, especially the backpack straps. The dry pocket is very helpful as well. Great Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: dont work
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag VERY BAD zippers.5 6 TIMES USED and started work bad,
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best bag ever! Fits all my scuba gear and still have room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good materials and looks like a big gym duffel
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I expected, good materials and looks like a big gym duffel, I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Finally, all my dive gear in one place thanks to the Meister Mesh Duffel Backpack!
customer_reviews.author: courtney suttle

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Had my fins, snorkel mask, towels, diving shoes and still lots of room left...
customer_reviews.author: vsm151

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke in 2 weeks while we were on vacation
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put all my dive gear in gear (bc, reg., fins, mask, lunch box)
customer_reviews.author: justin lovett

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Dive Bag?
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big and roomy without being too big. I love the shoulder straps so I can carry it like a backpack. The zippers seem to be very durable. I can easily carry my fins, mask/snorkel, dive boots, regulator, and BC. I also like the separate zippered compartment on one end to carry parts, tools, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W.

customer_reviews.title: The bag itself worked great. We were able to fit 3 sets of ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself worked great. We were able to fit 3 sets of masks, snorkels and fins in the bag. As well as our dive booties and dive log books. The shoulder straps were comfortable and the bag had plenty of room. The problem is that the zipper broke off as I closed it to travel back home. This was the first trip I used the bag on and probably only the 5-6 time I had zipped it up. Luckily it was zipped closed and didn't come open until I got back to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Meister Mesh Duffel Backpack Dive Bag w/Dry Pocket for Scuba & Snorkeling
product_meta.description: Divers and watersports athletes know the importance of taking care of your gear and always having it on hand. The Meister Mesh Duffel Backpack Dive Bag is the oversized gear bag you need to carry all of your Scuba, snorkeling and other water gear. Constructed from super-strong double-layered Chain Mesh, it is designed to take a beating. This unique material allows water to drain and air to flow while not compromising on strength. This bag is also incredibly lightweight, weighing in at less than two pounds. The Meister Mesh Dive Bag can be carried as a duffel bag or worn as a backpack using the comfortable shoulder straps. Flexible and versatile, the bag also conforms to the shape of your gear to minimize excessive bulk, with plenty of room for your fins, booties, mask, snorkel, and more! The bag features a large water-resistant dry pocket on one side, designed to shield your personal belongings from wet gear and soggy environments. Inside the bag there is a small mesh pocket for your wet accessories such as diving watches and defogger. Upgrade to the Meister Mesh Duffel Backpack Dive Bag w/ Dry Pocket and take the hassle out of managing your gear!
feature_bullets: Super strong chain mesh allows water and air flow
Oversized to fit all your gear - 29" x 15" x 15"
Comfortable backpack straps for easy carrying
Incredibly light and versatile - weighs under two pounds
Large water-resistant side dry pocket for personal items
